text: Echo and the Bunnymen is an English alternative rock band formed in Liverpool in 1978. ==Discography== ;Studio albums * Crocodiles (1980) * Heaven Up Here (1981) * Porcupine (1983) * Ocean Rain (1984) * Echo and the Bunnymen (1987) * Reverberation (1990) * Evergreen (1997) * Flowers (2001) * Siberia (2005) * The Fountain (2009) * Metorites (2014) ==References== Category:1978 establishments in the United Kingdom Category:Musical groups disestablished in 1993 Category:Musical groups established in 1978 Category:1993 disestablishments in England Category:1996 establishments in England Category:Musical groups established in 1996 Category:1970s establishments in England Category:Warner Bros. Records artists Category:Echo & the Bunnymen
title: Echo and the Bunnymen
